item.title: [Daily] Skills.sh snapshot (2026-02-17)
item.description: Daily snapshot. Providers: skills.sh All Time skills: 28340 Trending skills: 25070 Hot skills: 1318 Top All Time: find-skills (243068) Top Trending: find-skills (7674) Top Hot: mcp-builder (88)

item.title: [Hot] New entry (#1): mcp-builder
item.description: New entry in Hot leaderboard. Rank: #1 Installs: 88 Source: mcp-use/mcp-use Description: Build Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers with mcp-use framework. Use when creating MCP servers, defining tools/resources/prompts, working with mcp-use, bootstrapping MCP projects, or when user mentions MCP development, tools, resources, or prompts.

item.title: [Hot] New entry (#17): git-commit

item.description: New entry in Hot leaderboard. Rank: #18 Installs: 6 Source: cloudflare/skills Description: Reviews and authors Cloudflare Workers code against production best practices. Biases towards retrieval from Cloudflare docs over pre-trained knowledge.

item.title: [Hot] New entry (#19): ui-ux-pro-max
item.description: New entry in Hot leaderboard. Rank: #19 Installs: 5 Source: likaia/nginxpulse Description: UI/UX design intelligence. 50 styles, 21 palettes, 50 font pairings, 20 charts, 8 stacks (React, Next.js, Vue, Svelte, SwiftUI, React Native, Flutter, Tailwind). Projects: website, landing page, dashboard, admin panel, e-commerce, SaaS, portfolio, blog, mobile app, .html, .tsx, .vue, .svelte. Elements: button, modal, navbar, sidebar, card, table, form, chart. Styles: glassmorphism, claymorphism, minimalism, brutalism, neumorphism, bento grid, dark mode, responsive, skeuomorphism, flat design. Topics: color palette, accessibility, animation, layout, typography, font pairing, spacing, hover, shadow, gradient.
